Package com.payd.shooti.ui.elements

Class CountdownLabel

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Widget
com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Label
com.payd.shooti.ui.actors.UILabel
com.payd.shooti.ui.elements.CountdownLabel
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Layout, IUIElement
public class CountdownLabel extends UILabel
A UILabel that counts down from a defined number of seconds. Calling any animation functionality while stop the timer.
